comments.body:
Why do you have these get_ and set_ methods? https://github.com/larryprice/novnc-core#usage says the only public methods of this class are: 

> /*
>  An rfb has the following public methods (see lib/rfb.js for more details):
>   * connect(host, port, password, path)
>   * disconnect()
>   * sendPassword(passwd)
>   * sendCtrlAltDel()
>   * xvpOp(ver, op)
>   * xvpShutdown()
>   * xvpReboot()
>   * xvpReset()
>   * sendKey(keysym, code, down)
>   * clipboardPasteFrom(text)
>   * requestDesktopSize(width, height)
> */
This is described in their main wiki, which is in a different project. You can find it here: https://github.com/novnc/noVNC/wiki/Modules-API#configuration-attributes
